snippet: The Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe said the military and the Luhansk People’s Republic agreed to order a cease-fire starting Friday.
lead_paragraph: The Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe said the military and the Luhansk People’s Republic agreed to order a cease-fire starting Friday.

headline.main: Ukraine and Rebel Group Say They’ll Recommit to a Cease-Fire

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
